name: Hamburger Casserole
description: Keep this recipe in your back pocket for busy weeknights. Itâ€™s a comfort food classic made even easier thanks to the Multipurpose Steamer. Revamp leftover soup as a rich, tomatoey sauce to clear out your fridge and get a meal on the table STAT. Hurray for easy dinners!
preparation: Cook pasta in a large pot according to package directions. Drain well.

Meanwhile, place beef in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high 4 min, or until beef is cooked through. Once cooked, carefully drain excess liquid from steamer. Use Ground Meat Separator to break up chunks.
Add cooked pasta and soup to Steamer; stir to combine. Top with cheese. Microwave, uncovered, 3 min, or until casserole is heated through and cheese is bubbly.
Let casserole rest, uncovered, 5 min, before serving.
